name: HaikuFun
0:
”Alexa, open haiku fun”
”Alexa, launch haiku fun”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: haiku fun
des:
Haiku Fun pulls the best of the 5-7-5 Japanese poetry and randomly select one to read out loud. By default, Haiku Fun will stop after reading one complete haiku. 
To get started, ask:
"Alexa, read me a haiku."
"Alexa, open Haiku Fun."
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
